company.name: Razorpay
company.description: India's leading payment gateway and financial services platform

faq.question: What does Razorpay do?
faq.answer: Razorpay is India's leading payment gateway that enables businesses to accept, process and disburse payments online. We offer a complete suite of financial products including payment gateway, payment links, subscriptions, marketplace solutions, and banking services.

faq.question: What are your pricing plans?
faq.answer: We offer competitive pricing starting at 2% per transaction for payment gateway. For high-volume businesses, we provide custom pricing. Our payment links are free to create, and we also offer enterprise solutions with dedicated support.

faq.question: Do you have a free tier?
faq.answer: Yes! You can create payment links for free and only pay when you receive payments. We also offer a sandbox environment for testing at no cost. New businesses get special onboarding support.

faq.question: Who is Razorpay for?
faq.answer: Razorpay serves everyone from small startups to large enterprises. Our customers include e-commerce stores, SaaS companies, educational institutions, healthcare providers, and any business that needs to accept digital payments in India.

faq.question: How easy is it to integrate?
faq.answer: Very easy! We provide SDKs for all major programming languages, detailed documentation, and can be integrated in under 30 minutes. Our technical team provides 24/7 support during integration.

faq.question: Is Razorpay secure?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We are PCI DSS Level 1 certified and RBI approved. We use bank-grade security with 256-bit SSL encryption and fraud detection algorithms to protect all transactions.

faq.question: What payment methods do you support?
faq.answer: We support 100+ payment methods including all major credit/debit cards, UPI, net banking, wallets like Paytm, PhonePe, and international cards. We also support EMI and Pay Later options.

faq.question: How fast are settlements?
faq.answer: We offer instant settlements! Funds can be settled to your bank account within minutes. For regular settlements, it's T+1 working day. Enterprise customers get even faster settlement options.
